data.title: Madison Ice Inc
data.text:
Any amount you can give is appreciated!

With your help we can make another new skaters dreams come true!

Madison Ice Inc. is proud to announce a new financial assistance

program available to skaters and their families.

The Learn-to-skate Financial Assistance Program will offer

up to 90% financial aid toward a youth skater’s registration

fee based on a family’s income and application.

How Can You Help?

Please consider sponsoring a skater who would otherwise not be able to afford ice skating lessons. Skating is a life-long individual sport in which everyone can participate and we want to give everyone the opportunity to do so!

Please watch this area during the season for inclement weather conditions, and we will update this area if we decide to close the rinks for any reasons such as school closings.

Though it is rare when we close the rink, it happens. When it does, this is where you will be notified, unless you have otherwise been told by your team/managers.

Thank you,

Management
